committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend section 507 of the Housing Act of 1949 to make the veterans' preference applicable to veterans of the post-Korean era.

summary.text: Makes the veterans' preference, under the Housing Act of 1949 applicable to veterans of the post-Korean era.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 507 of the Housing Act of 1949 to make the veterans' preference applicable to veterans of the post-Korean era.
